data.text: @curtispenner @UnaVoceHamilton @CityNewsKIT Mask r useless looool. Covid is the common cold. Get over urself. Liberals ruining school. Shouldn’t be any mandates

@UnaVoceHamilton @CityNewsKIT Ever heard of polio? The measles? If you don’t catch it, you can’t spread it. I read your other tweet about masks. Yes they work too. No matter how many times you say they don’t. Stop hiding behind pithy usernames. Post your pic and name

@Murcut @CityNewsKIT Well then educate me Mike.

What's the purpose of people at the university being mandated to get vaccines?
@nailedvision @CityNewsKIT This tweet makes it clear that you have never set foot in a university, or a college, or even finished high school.

@Murcut @CityNewsKIT Why is it a no brainer to force people to take a vaccine with nine pages of side effects if the vaccine is not stopping transmission?

Maybe the people so afraid should be mandated to take CBT/DBT.
@CityNewsKIT An institute of higher learning should know the injections do not prevent transmission thus the mandates are uselesss.
@CityNewsKIT No brainer, as is Conestoga College.
